title: SS.PT.380
prompt: A country creates a government-run health care option. The government will offer health care plans, and people can subscribe to government health care or to private health care. Based on the information in the chart, which answer best describes the government-run health care option?
description: The chart presents differences in government control of the economy.
feedback: A mixed economy contains both government-run services and privately owned businesses. Because the example contains both a government-run health care service and private health care, it is a mixed economy.
